long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hiver is a delightfully easy-to-use customer service platform that brings together all your communication channels, apps, and data so you can provide stellar support to every customer. 

Hiver enables real-time collaboration across every customer communication channel, powered by AI and automation to resolve issues and help teams work faster. Over 10,000 teams of all shapes and sizes globally from Flexport to Harvard University, Upwork, and Epic Games rely on Hiver to deliver exceptional support that wins and retains customers for life.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hiver brings powerful features to your inbox:

✅Omnichannel Shared Inboxes: Simplify how you manage shared inboxes like support@ and info@. Create ownership for every email, chat, call, or WhatsApp message. Collaborate faster internally and keep teams productive with Hiver.

✅Live chat with AI: Set up and engage with your website visitors on live chat. Deliver instant resolutions with AI and chatbots.

✅Customer portal and knowledge base: Empower customers and employees to find answers on their own, submit issues, and track their resolutions.

✅Automations: Improve team productivity by automating repetitive and grunt work through powerful rule-based automation.

✅Integrations: Bring all your customer context from 100+ apps like Hubspot, Salesforce, Monday, Jira, Asana, and more. 

✅Analytics: Track key support metrics like response times, team workload, customer satisfaction scores, and more.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why Hiver?

- Used by 10,000+ teams, including those at Vacasa, Flexport, and NYU
- Designed for simplicity and works right inside your inbox
- Over 1000+ 5-star reviews on G2 and 24/7 support across all plans
- Affordable and flexible pricing plans
- Hiver is GDPR, ISO27001, SOC2 Type II, HIPAA, and CCPA compliant

Start a free trial by downloading the Chrome extension or request a demo by visiting hiverhq.com
